programme.title: Kevin Hart: Standing Tall
programme.desc: Laughter is the best medicine. Just ask Kevin Hart. Comedy would rule as an antidote to a troubled childhood. Hart’s work ethic has no limits, with 8 comedy specials, 54 films, 90 TV shows, and a world tour to date.

programme.title: The Perfect Mate
programme.desc: When Hope's relationship crumbles, she seeks a Christian man to meet her family's expectations. Jesse steps up, but it's challenging.

programme.title: Love Lives Here
programme.desc: Zinhle is a hardworking modern woman with traditional values. She knows exactly what she wants and believes she knows what the next best step is for her: getting married. But the journey there isn't as easy as it should be.

programme.title: Love Goals
programme.desc: Meet Kamela, a driven young black woman focused on her business, steering clear of love. Eli, her best friend is determined to play matchmaker against her wishes.

programme.title: The Policy
programme.desc: In the midst of a troubled marriage, Xavier and Anaya Kelinbrew hatch a sinister plan with friends and hitmen to murder each other for insurance payout.

programme.title: Bogoblack
programme.desc: In Bogotá, Juliana resists love with Jonier, a married man, until their passion sparks a deeper journey—one of identity, ancestry, and self-worth.

programme.title: The People's Games
programme.desc: The People's Games premiere explores exotic and traditional sports worldwide, featuring Nagol, Yamakasa, and more.

programme.title: Shabu
programme.desc: Shabu, a 14-year-old artist from "The Paperclip," Rotterdam's tough hood, wrecks his grandma's car and must hustle to repay her by summer's end, using his music and wit to shine.

programme.title: Last Of The Mississippi Jukes
programme.desc: Explore the roots of blues in the fading juke joints of Mississippi, where local musicians at Subway Lounge and Ground Zero Blues Club, keep the century-old tradition alive.

programme.title: Yankee Hustle
programme.desc: A quick-witted dramedy showcasing the explosive and hilarious journey of three African immigrants as they navigate the treacherous waters of legal status, social awkwardness, romance, and challenging friendships while maintaining their cultural pride.

programme.title: Yankee Hustle

programme.title: Collateral Interest
programme.desc: A witty criminal has his 10-year-old brother abducted by the Mexican cartel after a robbery gone wrong. Now, he must pay 18 million dollars in exchange for his brother’s life.

programme.title: Collateral Interest
programme.desc: A witty criminal has his 10-year-old brother abducted by the Mexican cartel after a robbery gone wrong. Now, he must pay 18 million dollars in exchange for his brother’s life.

programme.title: JK's House
programme.desc: At JK’s House, Dr. Amber Jenkins (Robin Givens) and JK blend family values and life lessons with music and dance.

programme.title: Jess Goes West
programme.desc: A young African graduate moves to LA and discovers that life in the 'City of Angels' isn’t quite what she expected.

programme.title: Mothers In Love
programme.desc: After a miscarriage, a loving couple must live under the same roof with both their mothers who can't stand each other.

programme.title: Collateral Interest
programme.desc: A witty criminal has his 10-year-old brother abducted by the Mexican cartel after a robbery gone wrong. Now, he must pay 18 million dollars in exchange for his brother’s life.

programme.title: On The Other Foot
programme.desc: London cabbie Billy, an outspoken racist, faces a crisis when his daughter dates a black man. In a bizarre twist, he wakes up in a black man's body, leading to a comical exploration of race and society.
